title: ISic003454. I.Sicily inscription 003454
body:
1† Ένθάδε
2κὲτε Ἰωά-
3[νν]ης μον-
4[αχὸ]ς ὁ Με-
5[νου]θ

l.2 reg., orig. κὲτε

1†ΕΝΘΑΔΕ
2ΚΕΤΕΙΩΑ
3[..]ΗΣΜΟΝ
4[...]ΣΟΜΕ
5[...]Θ

l.2 reg., orig. κὲτε

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Rizzone 2009
  • 5: μαν Rizzone 2009 suggests as alternative

Italian translation

Maria Barbieri

Qui giace Iohannes monaco, Menouth (o Mamanth).

English translation

Maria Barbieri

Here lies Iohannes Menouth (or Mamanth), the monk.

commentary

The text of Cordano 2005 / 2014 is misleading (and the suggestion that the text is in a mixture of Greek and Latin is clearly incorrect), and the edition of Rizzone is to be preferred.

bibliography

  • 2009.0439 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • 59.1110 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Cordano 2005 125 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002668
  • Rizzone 2009 431-434 no.2 fig.3 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001634
  • Cordano 2014 109 no.11 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001366
